actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6056 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: States that the annual report of a private foundation required under the Internal Revenue Code need not include the names or addresses of needy or indigent recipients of charitable gifts or grants amounting to less than $1,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6056 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
